title: Fiatless
author: Fiatless
created_time: February 15, 2023, 06:06:23 PMLast edit: February 15, 2023, 08:53:42 PM by Fiatless
content: Belonging to this forum has some benefit which includes bitcoin education, financial intelligence, investment, interpersonal skills, and so on. But I observed that there are some improvements in some areas of my life that I need to share.Creativeity: The forum standard for post quality is very high. It is not like other social media platforms where you can post without planning or putting in the effort. Senior members in the forum are always willing to criticize and correct such substandard posts. This means you need to always think outside the box if you want to be productive in this forum. The pursuit of excellence in the forum will unconsciously spur members to be creative in thinking and writing.Innovation: This forum celebrates positive innovation. Staying around this form for some time now has made me innovative in my daily life. I am no longer content anymore with the status quo. This forum has helped me to have the feeling that I can do more or there is room for improvement.Giving: I saw members giving selflessly to the campaign manager Yahoo and I was touched. Recently I saw a thread for support of victims of the earthquake in Turkey and Syria and unconsciously I have started learning that I must not help only my relatives but I must extend help even to persons I don't know.Law-abiding: If you live in a place where laws are not obeyed, you will appreciate the forum. It indirectly makes you respect other people's work so that you will always acknowledge them by referencing them when you lift their work and also obey the rules in the forum. Teaching me that nobody is above the law is priceless.

comments.author: drwhobox
comments.body: Bitcointalk is not only a forum to talk about bitcoin. It is also the platform for many things. You can learn so many things just by giving some time on different boards here, but also you can stay on a board/section which interests you more.

comments.author: Nwada001
comments.body: I picture this forum as an educational community where we come to learn and, at the same time, teach and speak out our own ideas freely. Plagiarism is one of the do-not-do rules we have on this forum; it's better to see a thread you know nothing about and pass than to go over to the internet browser and copy and paste just to prove a point. You don't get punished here for speaking out your mind; you will be corrected if you are wrong, but if you plagiarize, you will be banned. The difference is clear, and the rules are simple.

comments.author: batang_bitcoin
comments.body: This forum is the best if you want to learn different things in life and not just about bitcoin, crypto, finance, politics, economics, etc. You name them all and you might find everything in here. It's all complete package and what I've learned a lot is about finance (bitcoin, alts, economics). That's why if we're not happy with this community, you're not seeing the light and the help that it's giving for free. Most resources can be found in the web but bitcointalk is something else and to mind you, satoshi was here, founded it and once has been active in here. You will feel that proud moment.

comments.author: coupable
comments.body: What is unique about the forum is that it goes beyond being a public space open to various discussions only. It allows business and different types of investments that are related to the blockchain in general. The membership and trust systems enable a relatively safe and evolving space, allowing users to make all kinds of exchanges among themselves, in addition to the flourishing of advertising (I do not mean here the advertisements that the forum manages itself).

comments.author: Nheer
comments.body: My favorite part iis the creativity aspect, they hold themselves to a high standard here and accept no-good postings. I read some comments on a user's profile claiming that they were spamming the forum with low-quality contributions and that other members were being banned for plagiarism, making it impossible for anyone to duplicate other people's work or content from outside websites. This forum provides a lot of knowledge-based assistance to its users, particularly for those who want to learn and develop. I have already learned a lot on this site.

comments.author: yazher
comments.body: The best thing about this community is they will share valuable tips and honest instructions because when they don't say the truth or they are wrong due to their lack of knowledge, others will correct them or they will even further explain it or give you the resources to study the topic. Unlike when you read articles or blogs about cryptocurrencies stuff, you will find that no one will oppose their opinions. no matter what they say and what they think about certain coins, that's why there are lots of newbies who fell into their trap, they were lured to invest in a pump-and-dump coin. If someone posts his opinion regarding a certain project here, he will be corrected or he will be rebutted if he is saying the wrong impression about the project he is promoting.
